title: I want to learn a song for the piano within a week. Can I do it? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yes. The important part is in the planning. There are a few questions you need to answer before you can come up with a realistic and achievable plan. Do you have any experience playing piano? If so, give an example of piece or level.Do you read music or play any other instruments?What kind of music did you want to play? Pop song, classical, blues?Is there a specific end of week goal you have like a performance or recording?How much time can you allocate to this project?Are you looking for something to challenge you or just be enjoyable?How are you planning to learn this piece? By reading? YouTube video? Someone teaching you?Answering these questions will allow an appropriately leveled piece and a practice/learning plan that will make sure you can accomplish your goal. Then you have the information that will allow someone to help you make a plan and choose a piece. Feel free to reach out for more help!

This is an extremely broad question, because it all depends. If I practiced a difficult song for a minute every day, of course I am not going to master it. Now, if I practice that song (or even an easier song) for 15 minutes or more, there is a higher chance. Another thing to keep in mind is the length of the song, how well you know it (when you listen to it are you familiar with what is coming next… in other words, have you memorized the song in your head?), what resrouces you’re using to learn it (lessons? sheet music? videos? picking it out by ear?), how long it usually takes you to master certian songs, your skill level, how long you’re willing to practice, etc. Ask yourself all of these questions, then step back and analyze the situation. If you feel like you can maybe do it, give it a try. What’s the worst that could happen? Although, if you’re playing this song for a performance and you’re doubtful that you’ll be able to play it, you may want to consider choosing another song or talking to your teacher/band conductor. You definetley do not want to go on stage if you’re not confident, comfortable, and/or fully prepared. Good luck!
